item.description:
Do you have cabin fever? The snow and cold getting to you? Then join us for some bowling and get active. All levels are welcome. We will go for a meal nearby after bowling (restaurant to be determined).

Costs per string = $5.25
Bowling Shoe rental = $3

We will bowl 2 strings. You may bring your own bowling shoes if you have them.

Transportation - for those taking the MBTA ,you can take red line to Alwife T stop. We will arrange for someone to pick you up from there and go to the bowling alley. Please note this in your rsvp if you need a ride.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Bowling & Dinner
